com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali

Class ScenePoseCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.ScenePoseCalculator

  • public final class ScenePoseCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenient class for calculating transformations from the Tango world to the OpenGL world, using Rajawali specific classes and conventions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 COLOR_CAMERA_T_OPENGL_CAMERA

      Transformation from the Tango Area Description or Start of Service coordinate frames to the OpenGL coordinate frame.

      Transformation for device rotation on default orientation.

      Transformation for device rotation on 180 degrees.

      Transformation for device rotation on 270 degrees.

      Up vector in the Tango start of Service and Area Description frame.

      Converts a point, represented as a Vector3 from it's initial refrence frame to the OpenGl world refrence frame.

      Calculates a transformation matrix based on a point, a normal and the up gravity vector.
      static Pose matrixToPose(org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 m)
      Helper method to extract a Pose object from a transformation matrix taking into account Rajawali conventions.
      static com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData matrixToTangoPose(org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 transform)
      Converts a transform in Matrix4 format to TangoPoseData.
      static com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData planeFitToTangoWorldPose(double[] point, double[] normal, com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData tangoPose, DeviceExtrinsics extrinsics)
      Given a point and a normal in depth camera frame and the device pose in start of service frame at the time the point and normal were acquired, calculate a Pose object which represents the position and orientation of the fitted plane with its Y vector pointing up in the gravity vector, represented in the Tango start of service frame.
      void setupExtrinsics(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData imuTDevicePose, com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData imuTColorCameraPose, com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData imuTDepthCameraPose)
      Configure the scene pose calculator with the transformation between the selected camera and the device.

      Converts from TangoPoseData to a Matrix4 for transformations.

      Given the device pose in start of service frame, calculate the position and orientation of the depth sensor in OpenGL coordinate frame.

      Given a pose in start of service or area description frame, calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a OpenGL Scene Camera in the Rajawali world.

      Given the device pose in start of service frame, calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a OpenGL Scene Camera in the Rajawali world.

      Given a TangoPoseData object, calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a PointCloud in Depth camera coordinate system to the Rajawali world.

    • Field Detail

      • OPENGL_T_TANGO_WORLD

        public static final org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 OPENGL_T_TANGO_WORLD
        Transformation from the Tango Area Description or Start of Service coordinate frames to the OpenGL coordinate frame. NOTE: Rajawali uses column-major for matrices.

        public static final org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 COLOR_CAMERA_T_OPENGL_CAMERA
        Transformation from the Tango RGB camera coordinate frame to the OpenGL camera frame.

        Converts from TangoPoseData to a Matrix4 for transformations.

        public static com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData matrixToTangoPose(org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 transform)
        Converts a transform in Matrix4 format to TangoPoseData.

      • matrixToPose

        public static Pose matrixToPose(org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 m)
        Helper method to extract a Pose object from a transformation matrix taking into account Rajawali conventions.

      • toOpenGLPose

        public static Pose toOpenGLPose(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData tangoPose)
        Given a pose in start of service or area description frame calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a 3D object in the Rajawali world.

      • toOpenGLPoseWithScreenRotation

        public static Pose toOpenGLPoseWithScreenRotation(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData tangoPose,
                                  int rotationIndex)
        Given a pose in start of service or area description frame and a screen rotaion calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a 3D object in the Rajawali world.
        Parameters:
        tangoPose - The input Tango Pose in start service or area description frame.
        rotationIndex - The screen rotation index, the index is following Android rotation enum. see Android documentation for detail: http://developer.android.com/reference/android/view/Surface.html#ROTATION_0 // NO_LINT

      • calculateProjectionMatrix

        public static org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 calculateProjectionMatrix(int width,
                                                    int height,
                                                    double fx,
                                                    double fy,
                                                    double cx,
                                                    double cy)
        Use Tango camera intrinsics to calculate the projection Matrix for the Rajawali scene.

      • toOpenGlCameraPose

        public static Pose toOpenGlCameraPose(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData devicePose,
                      DeviceExtrinsics extrinsics)
        Given the device pose in start of service frame, calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a OpenGL Scene Camera in the Rajawali world.

      • toDepthCameraOpenGlPose

        public static Pose toDepthCameraOpenGlPose(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData devicePose,
                           DeviceExtrinsics extrinsics)
        Given the device pose in start of service frame, calculate the position and orientation of the depth sensor in OpenGL coordinate frame.

      • planeFitToTangoWorldPose

        public static com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData planeFitToTangoWorldPose(double[] point,
                                                                  double[] normal,
                                                                  com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData tangoPose,
                                                                  DeviceExtrinsics extrinsics)
        Given a point and a normal in depth camera frame and the device pose in start of service frame at the time the point and normal were acquired, calculate a Pose object which represents the position and orientation of the fitted plane with its Y vector pointing up in the gravity vector, represented in the Tango start of service frame.
        Parameters:
        point - Point in depth frame where the plane has been detected.
        normal - Normal of the detected plane.
        tangoPose - Device pose with respect to start of service at the time the plane was fitted.

      • matrixFromPointNormalUp

        public static org.rajawali3d.math.Matrix4 matrixFromPointNormalUp(double[] point,
                                                  double[] normal,
                                                  org.rajawali3d.math.vector.Vector3 up)
        Calculates a transformation matrix based on a point, a normal and the up gravity vector. The coordinate frame of the target transformation will be Z forward, X left, Y up.

      • getPointInEngineFrame

        public static org.rajawali3d.math.vector.Vector3 getPointInEngineFrame(org.rajawali3d.math.vector.Vector3 inPoint,
                                                       com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData deviceTPointFramePose,
                                                       com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData startServiceTDevicePose)
        Converts a point, represented as a Vector3 from it's initial refrence frame to the OpenGl world refrence frame. This allows various points to be depicted in the OpenGl rendering.

      • setupExtrinsics

        public void setupExtrinsics(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData imuTDevicePose,
                   com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData imuTColorCameraPose,
                   com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData imuTDepthCameraPose)
        Configure the scene pose calculator with the transformation between the selected camera and the device. Note that this requires going through the IMU since the Tango service can't calculate the transform between the camera and the device directly.

      • toOpenGLCameraPose

        public Pose toOpenGLCameraPose(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData tangoPose)
        Given a pose in start of service or area description frame, calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a OpenGL Scene Camera in the Rajawali world.

      • toOpenGLPointCloudPose

        public Pose toOpenGLPointCloudPose(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData tangoPose)
        Given a TangoPoseData object, calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a PointCloud in Depth camera coordinate system to the Rajawali world.
